{{loop.index}} {{i.item_name}} {{i.custom_daily_rate if i.custom_daily else "-"}} {{i.custom_weekly_rate if i.custom_weekly_rate else "-"}} {{i.custom_monthly_rate if i.custom_monthly_rate else "-"}} {{i.custom_mobilisation_charges}}

Note: Mobilization Charges are Not Applicable on Monthly Hires while for Daily or Weekly Hires Mobilization Charges will be applicable

Payment:    30 Days Credit from the Date of Invoice

Hope our offer will meet your requirements. Feel free to contact us for any assistance, discussion or negotiations. Your favorable response will highly be obliged and awaited.
With warm regards,
